Title: Episode #2.1
Writer: Dennis Kelly (creator), Dennis Kelly, Huw Kennair-Jones (original idea), Mark Aldridge (original idea), Clare McDonald (original idea)
Actors: Tom Burke, Rose Leslie, Anca Androne, Ed Birch
Plot: 1974, England - Scientist Philip Carvel has a fateful meeting with a young woman, Milner, bonding over a shared ideology their influence on each other will lead to the creation of a virus - their solution to the world's over-population.
